titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to facilitate the immigration to the United States of certain aliens born in the Philippines or Japan who were fathered by United States citizens.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5188)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/4/1994--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend preferential immigration treatment to certain children fathered by U.S. citizens and born in the Philippines or Japan.
